=配置大页=

==配置sysctl.conf==
{{{
# vi /etc/sysctl.conf
kernel.shmmax = <share memory max in bytes>
vm.nr_hugepages = <huge page count>

# sysctl -p
}}}

==写Linux内存文件==
{{{
# echo <share memory max in bytes> > /proc/sys/kernel/shmmax

# echo <huge page count> > /proc/sys/vm/nr_hugepages
}}}
